answerText: Click Chemistry[10] This Scripps Research Institute professor is the major proponent of click chemistry.

subject: Science
question: Question: For 10 points each, give some things related to a certain science: [10] This discipline encompasses chemical reactions that are high yield, wide in scope, stereospecific, simple to perform, and can be conducted in easily removable or benign solvents.
